name: Bubble Bullets
description: Bubble Bullets is a fun, educational  game that tests your problem-solving and math skills. The goal is to dodge incoming Bubbles and shoot targets to guess the nearest square root answer. You can control your character by using the arrow keys on your keyboard, and shoot targets with  space arrow key or  a click  of the mouse button. As you progress, you'll encounter increasingly difficult levels, with tougher  challenges. With each level, the speed and number of bullets differ, so you'll have to think fast and plan your moves accordingly. With its unique mix of action and mathematical Squere roots problem-solving, this game is sure to challenge and entertain players of all ages
